TEXT.S: = Kolinda Grabar-Kitarović (·-) = Mntucing hngkawas 1968 idas 4 jiyax 29 ka Kolinda Grabar-Kitarović ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bukung klwaan Croatia ta sayang o kiya ka Kolinda Grabar-Kitarović, pnaah hngkawas 2015 idas 2 jiyax 19 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. Her presidential term ended on 18 February 2020.
